name: European Pet Organization
goal: The European Pet Organization is the European organization with which national pet trade associations in Europe collaborate in order to strengthen their position on European and other international issues.
interests: Agriculture, Business and Industry, Customs, Environment, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
ACCESS AND BENEFIT SHARING (ABS)- the CBD Nagoya Protocol
ANIMAL FEEDS
ANIMAL FOOD AND FEEDS
ANIMAL HEALTH
ANIMAL SKINCARE PRODUCTS
ANIMAL TRADE
ANIMAL TRANSPORT
ANIMAL WELFARE
ANTIMICROBIAL RESISTANCE
BIOSECURITY
BREXIT
CITES
INVASIVE SPECIES
ONLINE SALES
WILDLIFE MANAGEMENT and TRADE
